Boxes, a brand logo, a sewing machine that turns on for 5 seconds every 10 seconds / Dimensions Variable

2015

Beyond the wall of boxes bearing the logos of fast fashion clothing brands, sewing machines flicker on and off repeatedly.

Sewing machine off
